Name: Card Craft
About the game: CardCraft Card Craft is a roguelike deckbuilder where you craft cards and battle your opponent on a grid. Journey across the map as you build your deck, enter combat, improve your cards, and complete quests. Choose Your Hero Choose between several unique heroes each with their own playstyle. Use their hero powers to gain an advantage over your opponent and claim victory. Campaign In Campaign mode you will battle enemies, find treasure, forge new cards, improve your deck, encounter unique quests, use potions, and embark on a journey to become the winner of the World Craft tournament. Quests Over 70 unique quests to find and as you journey across the map, each their own risks, rewards, and lore. Explore and learn more about the world as you improve your cards and claim victory. Buy Cards Over 200 cards are available, with their own special properties. Gather gold along your journey in the campaign from winning matches and finding treasure. Spend your gold on rare cards to improve your deck. Learn about the four symbols, Sword, Magic, Shield, and Bow. Perfect your strategy and claim victory. Craft Cards Improve your cards along your journey as you upgrade them in the forge. Collect potions to give your cards temporary upgrades during a match. Carefully build the perfect deck of cards to be prepared for any scenario. Quick Match Have fun in a shorter quick match game mode. All the fun of card craft strategy without the time and pressure of the full campaign. Difficulty ramps up as you win. Test your skills and see who has the fastest win Multiplayer Coming Soon Dungeon Mode Coming Soon
